content:
Hello, folks!
Given a test HAPI FHIR server with 100 Patients. I am using fhir-downloader with --global option to download bulk files from the server. Everything worked fine with 100 Patients.
Unless I populated the same HAPI FHIR instance with 60k of Patients. Now it gives me an output:
Screenshot-2021-07-06-at-19.50.27.png
Is there any limits? HAPI FHIR Server - 5.4.1
Thanks!
